A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: More plot holes than actual plot in the movie\, no character development and overall just a bland movie. It seemed like they tried their best to fit in a diverse cast and then strung a bunch of random action sequences together and threw cgi on it to try and make it look pretty. Didn't even feel like a star wars movie which was pretty much the only reason I went to see it in the first place.
